courses.title: Linear Algebra: Linear Systems and Matrix Equations
Linear Algebra: Matrix Algebra, Determinants, & Eigenvectors

faqs.question: How long does it take to complete the Specialization?
faqs.answer: The time it takes to complete the specialization is relative to each individual learner. The content presented in this specialization is roughly equivalent to a one semester (3 month) course for full time undergraduates at Johns Hopkins University.

faqs.question: What background knowledge is necessary?
faqs.answer: Successful completion of a basic course in algebra. No calculus is needed to complete this course.

faqs.question: Do I need to take the courses in a specific order?
faqs.answer: Yes. The course is designed to be completed in the order presented.

faqs.question: Will I earn university credit for completing the Specialization?
What will I be able to do upon completing the Specialization?
faqs.answer: This course prepares students to take more advanced courses that rely on linear algebra. This includes advanced topics in mathematics, business, finance, data science, AI, machine learning, and economics.

faqs.question: Is this course really 100% online? Do I need to attend any classes in person?
faqs.answer: This course is completely online, so there’s no need to show up to a classroom in person. You can access your lectures, readings and assignments anytime and anywhere via the web or your mobile device.

faqs.question: What is the refund policy?
faqs.answer: If you subscribed, you get a 7-day free trial during which you can cancel at no penalty. After that, we don’t give refunds, but you can cancel your subscription at any time. See our full refund policyOpens in a new tab.

faqs.question: Can I just enroll in a single course?
faqs.answer: Yes! To get started, click the course card that interests you and enroll. You can enroll and complete the course to earn a shareable certificate, or you can audit it to view the course materials for free. When you subscribe to a course that is part of a Specialization, you’re automatically subscribed to the full Specialization. Visit your learner dashboard to track your progress.

faqs.question: Is financial aid available?
faqs.answer: Yes. In select learning programs, you can apply for financial aid or a scholarship if you can’t afford the enrollment fee. If fin aid or scholarship is available for your learning program selection, you’ll find a link to apply on the description page.

faqs.question: Can I take the course for free?
faqs.answer: When you enroll in the course, you get access to all of the courses in the Specialization, and you earn a certificate when you complete the work. If you only want to read and view the course content, you can audit the course for free. If you cannot afford the fee, you can apply for financial aidOpens in a new tab.
